query:
SELECT DISTINCT tag
        FROM (
            SELECT unnest(tags) as tag FROM data.praxis_task WHERE is_active = true AND tags IS NOT NULL
            UNION
            SELECT unnest(tags) as tag FROM data.praxis_initiative WHERE is_active = true AND tags IS NOT NULL
            UNION
            SELECT unnest(tags) as tag FROM data.praxis_aspiration WHERE is_active = true AND tags IS NOT NULL
        ) all_tags
        ORDER BY tag
